entry.title: LPA, ITCZ to bring scattered rains over Mimaropa, Western Visayas, Mindanao, Quezon | UB

media:group.media:title: LPA, ITCZ to bring scattered rains over Mimaropa, Western Visayas, Mindanao, Quezon | UB
media:group.media:description:
Mimaropa, Western Visayas, Mindanao and Quezon will have cloudy skies with scattered rain showers and thunderstorms on Monday due to a low pressure area (LPA) and the Intertropical Convergence Zone (ITCZ), PAGASA said in its weather forecast.
